price: 157. Mereka itulah yang memperoleh ampunan dan rahmat dari Tuhannya, dan mereka itulah orang-orang yang mendapat petunjuk.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَلَوَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَرَحۡمَةٞۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalayhim ṣalawātun min rabbihim waraḥmatun wa-ulāika humu al-muh'tadūna
